long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify Weight Adjuster is a powerful tool designed to automate the process of adjusting product weights on Shopify's label creation page. This extension ensures accurate weight calculations, making your shipping process more efficient and hassle-free.

Key Features:

Automatic Weight Adjustment: Automatically adjusts the weight of your shipments based on predefined rules.
Recalculation Trigger: Simulates user interaction by clicking in and out of the weight input field to trigger recalculations.
Optimized for Multiple Items: Targets the last weight input field, accommodating orders with multiple items.
Seamless Integration: Works seamlessly on Shopify label creation pages without disrupting your workflow.
How It Works:

When you navigate to the Shopify label creation page, the extension automatically adjusts the weight according to the following rules:
If the weight is less than 16 ounces, it sets the weight to 16 ounces.
If the weight is greater than 16 ounces, it rounds down to the nearest pound if the remainder is less than 5 ounces.
After adjusting the weight, the extension simulates a user clicking in and out of the input field to trigger the recalculation of shipping options.
Permissions:

scripting: Allows the extension to inject scripts to interact with the Shopify label creation page.
storage: Used to store user preferences and settings for the extension.
host_permissions: Required to access and modify content on https://admin.shopify.com/.
